questions.question: What is the primary function of suspension insulators?

answers.a: To measure voltage in a circuit
answers.c: To provide mechanical support and electrical insulation

explanations.a: Incorrect – they do not measure voltage.
explanations.c: Correct – their role is both mechanical and electrical.

questions.question: What causes non-uniform voltage distribution in insulator strings?

explanations.b: Correct – due to mutual and stray capacitance.
